name: AJOUT
code:
DATA: ${target} TYPE string,
      ${source_text} TYPE xstring.
" please handle the class-based exceptions in case the source text contains characters incorrectly encoded.
${target} = cl_abap_codepage=>convert_from(
          source   = ${source_text}
          codepage = ${source_text_codepage} " for instance `utf-8`, `utf-16LE`, `utf-16BE`, ... (valid values in table TCP00A, in lines with CPATTRKIND='H')
          ).
